resources.string: Click here to start the sample tutorial
Click here to start a tutorial that will be shown only on first time launch
This is a tutorial with a custom layout describing a highlighted view
This is a tutorial with a simple text describing highlighted views\nTap anywhere to exit tutorial
Slide horizontally to continue with the tutorial
This is a tutorial that will be shown only on first time launch.\nGo back to the app home screen and relaunch. Notice that you wont see the tutorial help
